code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import API from'../api';import'../Styles.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AdminAllReservations(){const[reservations,setReservations]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{API.get('admin/reservations/').then(res=>setReservations(res.data)).catch(err=>console.error("Failed to fetch reservations",err));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Manage Reservations"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"All user bookings are listed below."})]}),reservations.map(res=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"room-card",style:{width:'70%',margin:'10px auto'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Room:"})," ",res.room.name,",\xA0",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"User:"})," ",res.user.username,",\xA0",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Date:"})," ",res.date,",\xA0",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Time:"})," ",res.start_time," - ",res.end_time]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"buttons",style:{marginTop:'10px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/admin/edit-reservation/".concat(res.id),className:"btn btn-yellow",children:"Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/admin/delete-reservation/".concat(res.id),className:"btn btn-green",style:{marginLeft:'10px'},children:"Delete"})]})]},res.id)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{textAlign:'center',marginTop:'30px'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/admin/dashboard",className:"btn btn-yellow",children:"Back to Dashboard"})})]});}export default AdminAllReservations;
